name: Wiked
description:
its a plugin for Vim to build a console-wiki with html-export.
i took a wiked and extended it, with thinks i want.
install_details:
- tar xzf wiked.tgz  -C ~/.vim
- cat ~/.vim/wikifiletype.vim >>  ~/.vim/filetype.vim
- rm ~/.vim/wikifiletype.vim
- vim ~/.vim/tools/unknown.wiki
- read sourcecode if you want to change something
